Ethos.metaDescription: Discover the story, philosophy, and values of Ferya, a bespoke stationery and decor creative house.
Ethos.label: About Us
Ethos.heading: Ferya — Creative
Ethos.p1: Before being a creative house, Ferya is a story of friendship.
Ethos.p2: Two childhood friends, bound by the years, shared memories, and a common sensitivity for beauty. Early on, we learned to observe the details: the textures, the colours, the simple gestures that transform an ordinary moment into a treasured memory.
Ethos.p3: Our professional paths led us into demanding fields — accounting and software engineering — where rigour, structure, and precision are essential. Yet alongside this, creation has always held a central place. Stationery, decoration, the art of hosting and celebrating have long been our shared language.
Ethos.p4: Ferya was born from this natural dialogue between reason and emotion, between mastery and sensitivity.
Ethos.p5: We envisioned a creative house where every piece is designed with intention, where nothing is superfluous, and where the detail becomes essential.
Ethos.p6: We create pieces destined to accompany life's defining moments: weddings, intimate celebrations, events that carry meaning. Objects you touch, you keep, and that continue to tell a story long after the event.
Ethos.philoText: At Ferya, we believe that every celebration is a canvas — an opportunity to create something beautiful, meaningful, and deeply personal. Our work is rooted in the conviction that the details matter, that the invitation your guests hold in their hands should be as extraordinary as the event itself.
Ethos.visionText1: At Ferya, we believe in a quiet, measured, deeply human luxury.
Ethos.visionText2: A luxury that doesn't impose itself, but reveals itself in the precision of proportions, the quality of materials, and the balance of forms.
Ethos.visionText3: Every project begins with listening. We take the time to understand your world, your intention, the atmosphere you wish to create. Then comes the work of composition: typefaces, papers, finishes, and formats come together with precision to give birth to a coherent and timeless creation.
Ethos.value1Description: Every design reflects the true essence of our clients — their stories, their heritage, and their dreams for the celebration ahead.
Ethos.value2Description: We pursue perfection in every stroke, fold, and finish. Our standards are uncompromising because your moments deserve the very best.
Ethos.value3Description: Design is a bridge between people. We create pieces that foster connection, evoke emotion, and become treasured keepsakes.

Process.metaDescription: Learn about Ferya's bespoke design process — from consultation to delivery.
Process.label: Our Process
Process.heading: How We
Process.description: Our collaborative process ensures every detail is perfect. Here's how we bring your vision to life.
Process.step1Description: We begin with a complimentary consultation to understand your vision, event details, and aesthetic preferences. Share your inspiration, colours, and cultural elements that matter to you.
Process.step2Description: Our designers create bespoke concepts tailored to your event. You'll receive detailed mockups and material samples to review, ensuring every element aligns with your vision.
Process.step3Description: We refine the designs based on your feedback, perfecting every detail — from typography and colour to paper weight and finishing techniques. Up to two rounds of revisions are included.
Process.step4Description: Once approved, our artisans bring your designs to life using premium materials and expert techniques — letterpress, foil stamping, laser cutting, hand-painting, and more.
Process.step5Description: Your finished pieces are carefully packaged and delivered to your door or venue, ready to delight your guests and make your celebration truly unforgettable.

FAQ.metaDescription: Frequently asked questions about Ferya's bespoke creations, delivery, and policies.
FAQ.label: FAQ
FAQ.heading: Frequently Asked
FAQ.a1: Yes. All our creations are made to order, based on the information provided at the time of purchase. Each piece is designed specifically for your event.
FAQ.q2: Can I modify my order after it's been confirmed?
FAQ.a2: Modifications after confirmation are not guaranteed. If production has not yet begun, certain changes may be accepted at Ferya's discretion and may incur additional fees.
FAQ.q3: How many revision rounds are included?
FAQ.a3: For fully custom projects, we include two rounds of revisions during the design phase to refine the details and ensure the result is perfectly aligned with your vision. Additional revisions can be made as needed and will be charged at an hourly rate.
FAQ.q4: Will the colours be exactly the same as shown on screen?
FAQ.a4: Slight variations may exist between the screen display and the final product due to screen settings, materials, and printing processes. These variations are part of the artisanal character of our creations and do not constitute a defect.
FAQ.q5: Do you use high-quality papers and materials?
FAQ.a5: Yes. We carefully select premium papers and materials to ensure an elegant, durable, and refined result.
FAQ.q6: When should I place my order?
FAQ.a6: We strongly recommend ordering as early as possible: North America, minimum 4 weeks before the event; international, 1 to 2 months in advance. Late orders are accepted with no guarantee of on-time delivery.
FAQ.a7: Rush orders may be accepted at Ferya's discretion, depending on our production capacity. Additional fees may apply.
FAQ.a8: Yes! We serve clients worldwide. All orders are carefully packaged and shipped via insured courier. International shipping costs and timelines vary by destination and are provided with your quote.
FAQ.a9: Delivery times vary by destination and carrier. The timelines provided are estimates and do not constitute a guarantee of delivery on a specific date.
FAQ.q10: Who is responsible once the order is shipped?
FAQ.a10: Once the order is handed over to the carrier, Ferya is no longer responsible for delays, losses, theft, or damage caused by the carrier. Any claims must be addressed directly to the carrier.
FAQ.q11: Are there taxes or customs duties?
FAQ.a11: For international orders, taxes, customs duties, or import fees may apply. These charges are the sole responsibility of the customer.
FAQ.a12: Cancellations are only possible before shipping and depend on the order's progress. Order processed but not printed: $10 CAD retention fee. Order in finishing or packaging phase: $70 CAD retention fee. No cancellation is possible once the order is completed or shipped.
FAQ.q13: Do you accept returns or exchanges?
FAQ.a13: No. Due to the personalised nature of our products, all sales are final. We do not accept any returns, exchanges, or refunds.
FAQ.q14: What if I made an error in my order?
FAQ.a14: The customer is responsible for all information provided. Ferya cannot be held responsible for errors approved by the customer.
FAQ.q15: What if my package arrives late?
FAQ.a15: Delivery times depend on the carrier and factors beyond our control. Ferya cannot be held responsible for delays.
FAQ.q16: Can I request a fully custom creation?
FAQ.a16: Yes. We offer custom creation services depending on the feasibility of the project. Contact us to discuss your vision.
FAQ.q17: Does Ferya reserve the right to refuse an order?
FAQ.a17: Yes. We reserve the right to refuse any order deemed unfeasible or not in keeping with our creative vision.

Privacy.metaDescription: Ferya's privacy policy — how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.
Privacy.label: Privacy
Privacy.heading: Privacy
Privacy.collectionText: We collect information you provide directly: your name, email address, phone number, event details, and billing/shipping addresses when you place an order or submit an inquiry. We also automatically collect certain technical data such as your IP address, browser type, and pages visited to improve our website experience.
Privacy.usageText: Your information is used to: process orders and deliver your products, communicate about your project, send order confirmations and shipping updates, respond to inquiries, improve our website and services, and send occasional newsletters (with your consent). We never sell your personal information to third parties.
Privacy.cookiesText: Our website uses essential cookies to maintain your session and preferences (such as language choice). We use analytics cookies to understand how visitors interact with our site. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings. Our payment processor may also set cookies necessary for secure transactions.
Privacy.thirdPartiesText: We work with trusted third-party services for: payment processing (Square), email communications (Resend), spam protection (Cloudflare), and website hosting (Vercel). Each of these services has their own privacy policy. We share only the minimum information necessary for them to provide their services.
Privacy.rightsText: You have the right to: access your personal data, correct inaccurate information, request deletion of your data, opt out of marketing communications, and request a copy of your data. To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@ferya.co.
Privacy.updatesText: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.
